ComicInfo.Summary: Welcome back to the Midnight Western Theatre! In this special issue, we follow the journey of the Navajo adventurer Ata'halne as he embarks on a quest seeking glory! Yet, as always, nothing is as it seems in this cracked mirror version of the wild west. Will Ata'halne survive this dark and twisted world he's stumbled upon or will he lay dying with the rest of the dead?
